com.suse.salt.netapi.calls

Class LocalCall<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.suse.salt.netapi.calls.LocalCall<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the return type of the called function
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Call<R>

    public class LocalCall<R>
extends Object
implements Call<R>
    Class representing a function call of a salt execution module.

      Calls a execution module function on the given target asynchronously and returns information about the scheduled job that can be used to query the result.

      • getPayload

        public Map<String,Object> getPayload()
        Return the call payload as a map of key/value pairs. Usually this contains the function name and arguments, but the various clients differ in the details.
        Specified by:
        getPayload in interface Call<R>
        Returns:
        call payload as a map of key/value pairs

      • callAsync

        public LocalAsyncResult<R> callAsync(SaltClient client,
                                     Target<?> target)
                              throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target asynchronously and returns information about the scheduled job that can be used to query the result. Authentication is done with the token therefore you have to login prior to using this function.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        Returns:
        information about the scheduled job
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callAsync

        public Map<String,CompletionStage<Result<R>>> callAsync(SaltClient client,
                                                        Target<?> target,
                                                        String username,
                                                        String password,
                                                        AuthModule authModule,
                                                        EventStream events,
                                                        CompletionStage<GenericError> cancel)
                                                 throws SaltException
        Calls this salt call via the async client and returns the results as they come in via the event stream.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        username - username for authentication
        password - password for authentication
        authModule - authentication module to use
        events - the event stream to use
        cancel - future to cancel the action
        Returns:
        a map from minion id to future of the result.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callAsync

        public Map<String,CompletionStage<Result<R>>> callAsync(SaltClient client,
                                                        Target<?> target,
                                                        EventStream events,
                                                        CompletionStage<GenericError> cancel)
                                                 throws SaltException
        Calls this salt call via the async client and returns the results as they come in via the event stream.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        events - the event stream to use
        cancel - future to cancel the action
        Returns:
        a map from minion id to future of the result.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callAsync

        public Map<String,CompletionStage<Result<R>>> callAsync(FunctionE<LocalCall<R>,LocalAsyncResult<R>> localAsync,
                                                        FunctionE<RunnerCall<Map<String,R>>,RunnerAsyncResult<Map<String,R>>> runnerAsync,
                                                        EventStream events,
                                                        CompletionStage<GenericError> cancel)
                                                 throws SaltException
        Calls this salt call via the async client and returns the results as they come in via the event stream.
        Parameters:
        localAsync - function providing callAsync for LocalCalls
        runnerAsync - function providing callAsync for RunnerCalls
        events - the event stream to use
        cancel - future to cancel the action
        Returns:
        a map from minion id to future of the result.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callAsync

        public LocalAsyncResult<R> callAsync(SaltClient client,
                                     Target<?> target,
                                     String username,
                                     String password,
                                     AuthModule authModule)
                              throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target asynchronously and returns information about the scheduled job that can be used to query the result. Authentication is done with the given credentials no session token is created.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        username - username for authentication
        password - password for authentication
        authModule - authentication module to use
        Returns:
        information about the scheduled job
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callSync

        public Map<String,Result<R>> callSync(SaltClient client,
                                      Target<?> target)
                               throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target and synchronously waits for the result. Authentication is done with the token therefore you have to login prior to using this function.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        Returns:
        a map containing the results with the minion name as key
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callSync

        public List<Map<String,Result<R>>> callSync(SaltClient client,
                                            Target<?> target,
                                            Batch batch)
                                     throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target with batching and synchronously waits for the result. Authentication is done with the token therefore you have to login prior to using this function.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        batch - the batch specification
        Returns:
        A list of maps with each list representing each batch, and maps containing the results with the minion names as keys.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callSync

        public Map<String,Result<R>> callSync(SaltClient client,
                                      Target<?> target,
                                      String username,
                                      String password,
                                      AuthModule authModule)
                               throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target and synchronously waits for the result. Authentication is done with the given credentials no session token is created.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        username - username for authentication
        password - password for authentication
        authModule - authentication module to use
        Returns:
        a map containing the results with the minion name as key
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callSync

        public List<Map<String,Result<R>>> callSync(SaltClient client,
                                            Target<?> target,
                                            String username,
                                            String password,
                                            AuthModule authModule,
                                            Batch batch)
                                     throws SaltException
        Calls a execution module function on the given target with batching and synchronously waits for the result. Authentication is done with the given credentials no session token is created.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        username - username for authentication
        password - password for authentication
        authModule - authentication module to use
        batch - the batch specification
        Returns:
        A list of maps with each list representing each batch, and maps containing the results with the minion names as keys.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • callSyncSSH

        public Map<String,Result<SSHResult<R>>> callSyncSSH(SaltClient client,
                                                    SSHTarget<?> target,
                                                    SaltSSHConfig cfg)
                                             throws SaltException
        Call an execution module function on the given target via salt-ssh and synchronously wait for the result.
        Parameters:
        client - SaltClient instance
        target - the target for the function
        cfg - Salt SSH configuration object
        Returns:
        a map containing the results with the minion name as key
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong
